text: Soni (kumbuchilani) lisiku lyatuchijitumisya mboni ku nkutula uliose jakuumila mu ŵanganyapeo jichijachonjela, ni tuchiyika namwe (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) kuŵa mboni pa ŵanganyaŵa. Soni tuntuluchisye Chitabu (Qur’an) chachikusalichisya chindu chilichose, chachili soni chongolo, chanasa ni abali jakusengwasya kwa Asilamu
